title: [1.6.2~1.8][ssp/smp]更好的和平[peacefulpack]合成怪物的掉落物！
author: SHP241
txt_content:
本帖最后由 SHP241 于 2015-7-26 19:43 编辑 

搬运证明：
更好的和平MOD，原来论坛里已经有转载了（但是连接挂了而且只有一个版本而且介绍太简洁）（不过我没有汉化）
本MOD宗旨是让和平模式也能拥有本来所不具有的怪物掉落物（包括骨头腐肉火药末影珍珠粘液球烈焰棒恶魂之泪）（不要问我为什么没有岩浆膏）不知道为什么还是有人问……烈焰粉+粘液球合成

介绍：
这是本MOD所有矿物
第一个是硫磺矿，主要用于造火药和火把（时运可加成）；第二个是硝石矿，主要用于造火药，增产骨粉（时运可加成）；第三个第四个和第五个是化石矿，打爆掉落1~4根骨头（时运可加成）；第六个是恶魂石，用于制作恶魂之泪（这玩意打爆掉落两个——也就是说它是无限的）；第七个是末影之眼矿石，在河底，打爆掉落一个末影之眼（时运可加成）；第八个是腐肉土，打爆掉落腐肉；最后一个是粘液球块，在地下生成一片，上方会刷史莱姆，走在上面会减速且不能跳跃，打爆掉落史莱姆球。
硝石、硫磺与其他mod的硝石/硝酸钾、硫粉/硫磺暂时不兼容
这是本MOD的植物

左边一个是亚麻，打爆掉落亚麻和亚麻种子；右边一个是腐肉植物，生产腐肉。亚麻只能种在草方块上，分布于平原森林等（基本遍地都是）；腐肉植物只能种在地狱岩上，分布于下界（废话）。

这一棵树是烈焰树，树干只能当燃料（……），树叶打落掉落烈焰棒、烈焰树种，同样种在地狱岩上，分布于下界。树叶也可以作燃料。
以上三种植物均可用骨粉催熟。
用两个亚麻可以合成两根线

两个线可以合成布

布可以替代皮革制作书、铠甲（像皮革一样摆，就不截图了）烧腐肉可以得到烧腐肉……两个烧腐肉可以合成皮革
9个铁栅栏可以合成6个铁索，铁索可以合成锁链铠甲

硫磺合成火把

硫磺硝石煤合成火药
恶魂之泪合成（忘了截图）：外面一圈恶魂石，中间一桶岩浆
硝石增产骨粉：
羊毛合成布：
新添加合成：
1、挖到化石矿
2、用金镐挖化石矿
3、挖更多化石矿= =
介绍完了
没什么人看的更新记录（未汉化）：
Version 1.1.9.1
– Fixed generation of fossils, niter and ghast ore
– Fixed Ghast ore texute
– Fixed server side crash
– Fixed dropping issue sulphur, niter & fossils
– Fixed some crafting recipes

Version 1.1.9.0
– Updated to Minecraft 1.8

Version 1.1.8.5
– Fixed blaze sapling planting issue

Version 1.1.8.4
– Added 5 new spanish translations and the Portuguese translation

Version 1.1.8.3
– Fixed Rotten Plant sappling planting issue
– Fixed a crash related to ghast ores
– Added Danish, German, French, Italian, Russian and Japanese translations

Version 1.1.8.2
– Added a config for update checking
– Added Portuguese translations

Version 1.1.8.1
– Fixed a crash when mining ghast ore

Version 1.1.8.0
– Slightly increased enderclam generation
– Lava requirement for Ghast Ore now is an option
– Greatly cleaned up the code
– Added creative tabs
– Improved blaze tree generation
– Fixed blaze trees
– Fix flax dropping itself
– Fixed bonemeal
– Fixed small problem with Biomes o Plenty
– Fixed many other unknown and known bugs

Version 1.1.7.1
– Fixed the block drop bug

Version 1.1.7.0
– Updated to Minecraft 1.7.2
– Added Burried remains
Version 1.1.6.4
– Added configuration options to the generation

Version 1.1.6.3
– Added update checker

Version 1.1.6.2
– Fixed a small problem with generation thanks to nokiarenaVersion 1.1.6.1
– Animated texturesVersion 1.1.6.0
– Fixed crash when ghast ore isn’t destroyed by a player
– Added Burried Remains which generate like pumpkins just underground, drops rotten flesh
– Moved rotten plant to netherVersion 1.1.5.14
– Updated to Minecraft 1.6.2Version 1.1.5.13
– Updated to Minecraft 1.6.1Version 1.1.5.12
– Fixed blaze small blaze sapling problemVersion 1.1.5.11
– Fixed ore generation problemsVersion 1.1.5.10
– Fixed ArrayIndexOutOfBounds error with FlaxVersion 1.1.5.9
– Should fix incompatibility with other mods (vanilla bug)Version 1.1.5.8
– Updated to 1.5.1
– No more base editVersion 1.1.5.7
– Fixed bonemeal not working
Version 1.1.5.6
– Removed testing recipesVersion 1.1.5.5
– Added Experience to drop from oresVersion 1.1.5.4
– Added a better configVersion 1.1.5.3
– Updated to Minecraft 1.4.6Version 1.1.5.2
– Updated to Minecraft 1.4.5Version 1.1.5.1
– Fixed a name bug with blaze saplingsVersion 1.1.5.0
– Updated to Minecraft 1.4.2Version 1.14.7
– Fixed some more bugs including seeds not workingVersion 1.14.6
– Spider Web bug fix
– Added Dutch translations
– Other fixesVersion 1.14.5
– Added glowing to blaze leaves
– Added particle effects to blaze leaves and slime slabs.Version 1.14.4
– Added a recipe for books with 1 cloth and 3 paper
– Fixed the mod.info fileVersion 1.14.3
– Fixed server not workingVersion 1.14.2
– Fixed world generation
– Fixed fuel
– Fixed other small things
Version 1.14
– Updated to 1.3.2
– Bug fixesVersion 1.13– Goo slabs now get a random name when you start Minecraft– The 3 types of fossils from the original peacefulpack are back– Craft 2 cooked flesh into leatherVersion 1.12– Updated to the new Forge VersionVersion 1.11.3– Improved some small things like block dropsVersion 1.11.2– 3 blocks in 1 idVersion 1.11.1– Bug fixes– Better slime generation– All the blocks in the creative inventoryVersion 1.11– Improved nether generation– Blaze tree saplingVersion 1.10– Added spider eyes to drop from cobwebVersion 1.9– Changed to forge– All the pictures in less files– No more editing the bonemeal core class– Flax can now appear when you use bonemeal on grassVersion 1.8.1– Added a recipe to change flax fibre into 3 flax seedsVersion 1.8– Changed block sounds
– Added the ender clamVersion 1.7– Changed the chain materail recipe to no longer use a diamond– Added ghast ores and generation– Added bonemeal for flax and rotten plantsVersion 1.6– SMP– Took out block sounds, because they crashedVersion 1.5.2– Changed the stepsounds– fixed several recipesVersion 1.5.1– Changed several textures.Version 1.5– Changed slime pool generation. It might generate strangely now, but at least it does a bit more often.– Added the blaze treeVersion 1.4– Sulphur dust now is fuel like coal– New chain material– New chain armor recipes– New cooked flesh– New rotten plant– New rotten plant seed– rotten plant generation– cloth now crafts normal wool instead of orange– sulphur torches work again– string is half the price now– Now it’s a zip file– Fixed generation againVersion 1.3.1– Bug fixesVersion 1.3– Added changeable block Id’sVersion 1.2– Flax now grows on grass– All the ores generate more– All the ores drop what they should– Slimepools emit a little bit of light– Better slimepool generatingVersion 1.1– Updated to Minecraft 1.2.4Version 1.0– Updated it to minecraft 1.2.3- See more at: http://www.wuppy29.com/minecraft ... thash.L9CZmw4x.dpuf

下载地址：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1hILYm本MOD与腐肉烧皮革MOD冲突，你懂得- -
本MOD旨在合成怪物掉落物，并非只有和平模式可用

新人第一次发帖，求支持！要金粒和人气？
那么问题就来了——挖掘机技术哪家强？



答：中国山东找蓝猫，一节更比六节强！

嘛，这都被你发现了，你这么聪明就评个分吧~
